chinese: Hi, Hi ,Yvonne.
english: Hi, Hi, Yvonne.

chinese: 你今天居然用不着工作到很晚,
english: You didn't have to work late.

chinese: 这可真是一大惊喜啊.
english: This is a nice surprise.

chinese: Yes. 我现在是一身轻了.
english: Yes. I'm a free man.

chinese: 不过看样子你们俩还在忙着呢.
english: But it looks like you two are still at it.

chinese: No, no ,我们已经干完了.
english: No, no, We're all finished.

chinese: 我只是在等Douglas来接我.
english: I'm just waiting for Douglas to pick me up.

chinese: 你的车又进维修站了吗，Yvonne?
english: Is your car in the shop again, Yvonne?

chinese: 是的. 这部车又旧又破, 声音大得连死人都能吵醒.
english: Yes, It's old and cranky and loud enough to wake the dead.

chinese: 我是非得买辆新车不可了.
english: I just have to buy a new one.

chinese: 我们也的确需要有两部车.
english: We really do need two cars.

chinese: Well, 那当然. Douglas其实差不多就住在车里了;
english: Well, sure. Douglas must just about live in his;

chinese: 不过搞房地产的都得这样.
english: you have to in real estate.

chinese: 说的是.所以我要么得等着搭别人的车,
english: Right. So I'm stuck either waiting for a ride from someone,

chinese: 要么乘出租车.
english: or taking cabs.

chinese: 那样的话，我就得听出租车司机讲很长,
english: Then I get to listen to cabbies telling very long,

chinese: 很无聊的故事. 真让人心烦.
english: very boring stories. It's very annoying.

chinese: 我就不会觉得烦.
english: I don't get annoyed at that.

chinese: 我喜欢话多的出租车司机.
english: I love talkative cabbies.

chinese: 那我们换车好了,
english: Let's trade cars.

chinese: 那样你就会有很多时间坐在出租车里了.
english: You'll get lots of time in cabs.

chinese: So，你今天过得怎么样?
english: So, how was your day?

chinese: 今天是重大的一天，
english: It was a big one.

chinese: 我交了辞呈.
english: I gave my notice.

chinese: Well，那你参加公职竞选的事就定下来了.
english: Well, that certainly makes it real.

chinese: Oh, yeah.
english: Oh, yeah.

chinese: 你不能参加公职竞选, 如果你还在为政府部门工作的话.
english: You can't run for state office if you're employed by the state.

chinese: 你是不是打算开一家私人律师事务所?
english: Are you going to set up a private practice?

chinese: Yep.
english: Yep.

chinese: 他来了. 祝你们晚上过得愉快.
english: There he is. Have a good night.

chinese: So, 你打算怎么庆祝?
english: So, how do you want to celebrate?

chinese: 租一部片子看看, 再去买份比萨带回来吃?
english: Rent a movie, get a pizza to go?

chinese: 你可真懂得哄女孩子开心.
english: You sure know how to show a girl a good time.
